Hawthorne.Los Angeles Clippers Training Center: The Los Angeles Clippers Training Center is a 42,500 square foot (3,950 m2) two-story training facility for the Los Angeles Clippers of the National Basketball Association (NBA). Located in the planned community of Playa Vista in Los Angeles near Loyola Marymount University, the facility is at least 1 mile (1.6 km) away from nearby beaches (Playa Del Rey, Marina Del Rey, and Venice), 3 miles (4.8 km) north of Los Angeles International Airport, and 12 miles (19 km) southwest of Staples Center. While the team maintains some office functions at Staples Center, the Playa Vista facility serves as the official headquarters of the Clippers.
